recipes.label: Rush A Ritual for Quick Power
recipes.startdescription: If I bring the right trappings to a place with the right ambiance, I could perform a ritual to give myself great power. The actions I'd take might be...peculiar, and raise the suspicion of the general public.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Moth Ritual in a Nocturnal Space
recipes.startdescription: I have brought my implements, and the atmosphere is charged and ready.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Moth Ritual in a Nocturnal Space
recipes.startdescription: Each of the treasures I have brought with me must be left somewhere unexpected. Flowers behind the bar, shed carapace in an unattended drink, the poppet left in the gangster pocket.
recipes.description: Music brightens, Influence blossoms. For a moment I lose my language, my sight, my reason. My faculties return, but now tantalizing secrets hide in the fuzzy secrets.
